title: Which indicates internal locus of control

content.prompt: Which of the following is an example of an individual who demonstrates an internal locus of control?

choices.label: A woman believes that the reason she is often late to work is because of the traffic in her neighborhood.
A student volunteers at a food shelter because her school club requires community service of its members.
A man thinks that his displays of aggression are due to the extra caffeine he has been consuming lately.
A student decides to run for student government because he feels he can make some positive changes in the school.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
